title: From the Vault: Bill Schutt on the Heart
itunes:title: From the Vault: Bill Schutt on the Heart
description:
In this episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert chats with Bill Schutt, author of "Pump: A Natural History of the Heart," about the evolution of the heart and the history of humanity’s attempt to understand it -- along with a few questions about monsters. (originally published 09/30/2021)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
